Controller

Class ChesstoryGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • Controller.ChesstoryGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class ChesstoryGame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener
    Manages all the graphic elements and actions in-game (but not the chess board itself), including themes, logs displayer, rules displayer, time travel, etc.
    Author:
    Acevedo Roman and Guillemot Baptiste
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • f

        public static javax.swing.JFrame f

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChesstoryGame

        public ChesstoryGame(java.lang.String title,
                     int gameType,
                     javax.swing.JFrame f)
        Calls YACG to create the chessBoard with the selected rules. And creates the buttons, the timers, the text areas, etc. Calls save/load function when needed ...
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the game.
        gameType - Type of the game.
        f - Frame.

    • Method Detail

        public void addLogsText(java.lang.String s)
        Allows to add in an easier way texts to the logs text area.
        Parameters:
        s - The String to add.

      • addLogsMove

        public void addLogsMove(Deplacement d,
                        char piece,
                        char joueur,
                        boolean eaten)
        Add a formated string that represents the move which has been done to the logs displayer.
        Parameters:
        d - The move to add.
        piece - The piece concerned.
        joueur - The player concerned.

      • addMoveMadeByPlayer

        public void addMoveMadeByPlayer(Deplacement d,
                                boolean eaten)
        addMove(Deplacement d) with the player in addition. Also manage the timer's switch.
        Parameters:
        d - The move to add.

      • chessEvent

        public void chessEvent(int i,
                       java.lang.String s)
        Displays a text for the several events which can occured in a chess game (castling, promotion, check, etc).
        Parameters:
        i - The constant that corresponds to the event.
        s - The string which contains an other hint (such as the player concerned).

      • enableBrowserView

        public void enableBrowserView()
        Leave the game mode to enter browse mode. Which include : No interaction with the chess board, possibility of time travel and the timer to stop.

      • loadGame

        public void loadGame()

      • loadGame

        public void loadGame(java.lang.String nameOfTheFileToLoad)
        Displays the browser to select a file to load and then load this file if possible.
        Parameters:
        nameOfTheFileToLoad - Name of the file.

      • saveGame

        public void saveGame()
        Save the current game in a file which will contains rules, state of the chess board, etc.
